title: How to Make a Network Connection Private in Windows 10

steps.title: Open the Settings app
steps.content: Open the Settings app . Click the Start button and select the settings gear.

steps.title: Go to the Network & Internet category.
steps.content: Go to the Network & Internet category.

steps.title: Go to your network type.
steps.content: Go to your network type. Click either Wi-Fi or Ethernet from the left pane.

steps.title: Open the properties of the current connection.
steps.content: Open the properties of the current connection. Click the name of the current network box in the center portion of the window.

steps.title: Change the network profile to private.
steps.content: Change the network profile to private. Click the "Private" radio button under the "Network profile" header.

steps.title: Make your PC discoverable.
steps.content: Make your PC discoverable. Toggle on the switch under the "Make this PC discoverable" header. Doing so will change your connection type to private.
